item.description:
Hello Foto Friends!

There has been a discussion on the boards about what folks will be taking on for photo projects in the upcoming year.

 

So to kick of 2012 and get our creativity flowing we have decided to have a meeting to discuss proposed projects and see if we can create a group of photographers to help support one another's ideas and personal projects.

(I suggested that folks take a look at the 100 Print Project that Brooks Jensen of Lens Work Magazine did, which you can view here: http://www.brooksjensenarts.com/100prints.xml)

Personally, I have made a decision to try and take on this 100 print project for the upcoming year. Maybe some of you would like to join in- or create a project more suited for you- but this group would meet to help one another achieve our goals. What I am proposing for the group is this:

  • Participate in regular, structured meetings once a month to discuss one another's projects.
  • Set and attain goals important to you.
  • Receive support and accountability from the group.
  • Solve problems creatively as a result of group dynamics and shared experience.
  • Everyone should come prepared to discuss the subject of personal projects, and share thoughts and ideas.
  • Attend all as many sessions as possible- personally I think irregularities in participation will create disharmony and some frustration from other members.
  • Participate with positive feedback and support other group members in their endeavors.
  • I would hope that this group would become a safe place for members to feel they can be open, honest and trusting.

So if you are interested in being part of this group. Come join us Monday night and see what we can make happen...
item.how_to_find_us: First Floor of the Mansion at Visions by Baker

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Photography Projects for 2012
